channel.title: When i run it just exits
channel.description: i downloaded a new java and it replaced the old files i think in jre7 compiler works still, but when i click run on and source it just exits

item.title: When i run it just exits
item.dc:creator: @ultimatepkvillage ultimatepkvillage
item.description:
@ultimatepkvillage wrote:

@echo off color 0a title RubiksScape java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server pause

or if the first one doesnâ€™t work try this one

@echo off color 0a title RubiksScape "C:/Program Files (x86)/Java/Jre7/bin/java.exe" -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server pause
